name: Dirty Dog Dayz
description:
Those varmints are at it again! Created on a dare and in a private jam we realize here the unorthodox perspective of man's best friend and hope to explain why they love hunting varmits and the nuggets of gold(probably) which come forth in their desperate attempts at evasion.

Controls:

Mouse to navigate menus

WASD to move, Powerups have a 15 second timer, enjoy!

The Team

Kevin Ritz --Creator, Producer, Animator and 2d Artist of the Project https://kevinritz.itch.io/

Kevin Ward (Me)-- Gameplayer/Systems Engineer and Miscellaneous Programing and Engine work https://kevin-ward.itch.io/
